Name: Health Potion
Description: A glass vial full of mysterious red liquid.

Name: Mana Potion
Description: A glass vial full of mysterious blue liquid.

Name: Chalice of Heart
Description: A shining chalice that's filled to the brim.

Name: Wizard's Elixer
Description: Or at least you think it belonged to a wizard...

Name: Experience Vial
Description: Knowledge beyond your years in contained in the bottle!

Name: Speed Potion
Description: You couldn't sleep for a week the last time you drank this one...

Name: Magic Book
Description: I guess reading really does make you smarter!

Name: Rainbow Potion
Description: A vile-tasting concoction of various liquids... At least it works.

Name: Unstable Brew
Description: With great risk comes great rewards!

Name: Agressive Potion
Description: THIS ONE MAKES EVERYONE SO MAD!!!!

Name: Secret Drug
Description: Comes with a laundry lists of side effects in the coming years.
